price: 70. Kani waa Fadli xagga Alle ah, kuna Filan Alle inuu yahay wax kasta Oge.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَضۡلُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ عَلِيمٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: dhālika al-faḍlu mina al-lahi wakafā bil-lahi ʿalīman
